questions.question: This arc is where Luffy first demonstrates Gear Second and Gear Third while battling against CP9. What is...?
This story arc is named after its geographical formation and features the first appearance of Admiral Aokiji. What is...?
questions.answer: The Long Ring Long Land Arc

questions.question: In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates face off against the undead on a ghost island under the control of Gecko Moria. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability gives its user the power to create and manipulate strings. What is...?
This advanced form of Armament Haki allows the user to emit their Haki beyond their body to attack the inside of an object. What is...?
This ability, possessed by a character known as 'The Phoenix,' allows for regenerative powers. What is...?
questions.answer: Tori Tori no Mi, Model: Phoenix

questions.question: This character, a member of the Worst Generation, possesses the ability to create a 'Room' and manipulate objects and people within it. Who is...?
This character, also known as 'God', was the former ruler of Skypiea and wielder of a powerful staff called the 'Goro Goro no Mi'. Who is...?
This chief of staff of the Revolutionary Army is known for his flame powers and is a sworn brother to the Straw Hat Pirates' captain. Who is...?
